import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button } from 'react-bootstrap'; import Rating from '../components/Rating'; import products from '../products'; const ProductScreen = () => { const product = products.find(p => p._id === matchMedia.params.id) return <> Go Back

{product.name}

 Price: ${product.price} Description: ${product.description} Price: ${product.price} ; }; export default ProductScreen;
